alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 12:58PM CDT until April 15 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE...SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD...BARTON AND NORTHWESTERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pittsburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Quarter Size Hail was reported in southeast Pittsburg Kansas. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Lamar, Frontenac, Jasper, Liberal, Nashville, Mindenmines, Asbury, Lamar Heights, Waco, Irwin, Oakton, Opolis, Yale, Iantha, Verdella, Hannon and Boston. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 76. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
